description:
'''Taisia Mykolaivna Povaliy''' ({{langx|uk|Таї́сія Микола́ївна Повалі́й}}; {{langx|ru|Таи́сия Никола́евна Повали́й|Taisiya Nikolaevna Povaliy}}; [[née]] '''Hiriavets''', {{langx|uk|Гиряве́ць}}, {{langx|ru|Гиряве́ц|Giryavets}}; born 10 December 1964) is a [[Soviet Union|Soviet]], [[Ukraine|Ukrainian]], and  Russian singer and actress.

She started her career of singer in 1985. In 1993, she won the Grand Prix at the [[Slavianski Bazaar in Vitebsk]], Belarus.

In 1995, she released her first album. The next year she was awarded the [[title of honor|honorary title]] of [[Merited Artist of Ukraine]]. In 1997, she was awarded the title of [[People's Artist]] of Ukraine. In 1998, she was awarded the Order of Saint Nicholas Thaumaturgus (International).
